long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add volume control to radiohelsinki.fi. With this extension, at the bottom of the page will appear a volume controller that slides from left to right (lower to higher volume) as well as a mute button on the left side of the slider which turns sound on or off.
